description: The U.S. has indicted an online payment system for allegedly laundering $6 billion for the criminal underworld. What does that mean for other digital currencies? Also, the Case Schiller Index is up again in the biggest rise since 2006. Is it really good news? Plus, hear about the almost exclusively African American site that advertisers are flocking to.
title: Marketplace for Tuesday, May 28, 2013
teaser: The U.S. has indicted an online payment system for allegedly laundering $6 billion for the criminal underworld. What does that mean for other digital currencies? Also, the Case Schiller Index is up again in the biggest rise since 2006. Is it really good news? Plus, hear about the almost exclusively African American site that advertisers are flocking to.
byline: David Weinberg, Sabri Ben-Achour, Kai Ryssdal, Noel King, Mitchell Hartman, Mark Garrison and Phil Mercer
